title: Roasted Beet Salad with Feta Recipe
description: This warm beet salad includes feta cheese and a parsley and shallot vinaigrette. It's deliciously fresh, vibrant, and sure to impress your guests!
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Salad Vegetable Salad Recipes Beet Salad Recipes Roasted Beet Salad with Feta 4.8 (433) 320 Reviews 32 Photos This beet salad with feta is easy to make for a colorful and elegant side dish. I love making this with beets and shallots straight from our local farmers' market. Submitted by Shandeen Gemanis Updated on November 5, 2024 Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen Tested by Allrecipes Test Kitchen The Allrecipes Test Kitchen staff are a team of culinary pros who make and vet recipes using only equipment you'd find in a home kitchen. Staff credentials vary but include training at the Culinary Institute of America; kitchen stints in fine dining restaurants; and countless hours in the test kitchen itself. Meet the Allrecipes Test Kitchen Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 32 32 32 32 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 45 mins Additional Time: 15 mins Total Time: 1 hr 15 mins Servings: 4 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 4 servings 4 beets, trimmed, leaving 1 inch of stems attached ¼ cup minced shallot 2 tablespoons minced fresh parsley 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar 1 tablespoon red wine vinegar salt and pepper to taste ¼ cup crumbled feta cheese Directions Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Wrap each beet individually in aluminum foil and place onto a baking sheet. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Bake beets in preheated oven until easily pierced with a fork, 45 minutes to 1 hour. Allow beets to cool until you can handle them. Peel beets and cut into 1/4-inch slices. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios While beets are roasting, whisk shallots, parsley, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, and red wine vinegar together in a bowl until blended; season with salt and pepper and set aside. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place warm, sliced beets onto a serving dish; pour vinaigrette over the beets and sprinkle with feta cheese. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Recipe Tip You can substitute green onions or chives for shallot if you prefer. I Made It Print 487 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 149 Calories 10g Fat 11g Carbs 4g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 4 Calories 149 % Daily Value * Total Fat 10g 13% Saturated Fat 3g 17% Cholesterol 14mg 5% Sodium 243mg 11% Total Carbohydrate 11g 4% Dietary Fiber 2g 9% Total Sugars 7g Protein 4g 8% Vitamin C 7mg 8% Calcium 98mg 8% Iron 1mg 6% Potassium 327mg 7% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Roasted Beet Salad with Feta 01 of 32 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 32 Photo by  lutzflcat 09/02/2023 Didn’t have any shallots, so I took the recipe submitter’s suggestion and used green onions. I never buy red beets anymore, golden beets are just so much sweeter, so that’s what I used. This is the type of salad that I would expect to be served at a really nice restaurant, it’s definitely upscale. The mildly tangy dressing gives balance to the sweet beets and creamy feta. Enjoyed for lunch today, served on a bed of lettuce and with some garlic and chive pita chips that I bought at Aldi. Wouldn’t hesitate to serve this to company, excellent! 03 of 32 Photo by  beth 05/20/2021 Excellent recipe! Lots of flavor and so easy to make as long as you have an hour to bake. I didn’t change anything in the recipe. 04 of 32 Photo by  Christine Proffitt 10/03/2020 05 of 32 Photo by  Jessie Elizabeth Fleming 11/30/2019 Excellent salad recipe that was a hit at Thanksgiving even with people who normally avoid beets! I used goat cheese instead and mixed into a bed of spring greens and baby arugula. This will be my go-to salad dressing at home-simple and delicious and healthy! 06 of 32 Photo by  pdguerin 11/22/2019 This recipe is the bomb! It’s currently late November and I still have beets sitting in my garden. Thought this would be a great way to use them. Turns out it was an AMAZING way to use them. I had a lot of little ones so I wrapped those together in a single packet, and the big beets as singles. Pretty simple. Followed the recipe exactly. Will definitely do this again! 07 of 32 Photo by  Kbrown 11/22/2019 For someone that doesn’t really like beets, this was good. 08 of 32 Photo by  gags73 08/16/2019 09 of 32 Photo by  Ed Grabasandwich 05/12/2019 Love it! Thinly sliced roasted beets on a bed of arugula. Topped with walnuts, crumbled feta and sliced goat cheese, drizzled with a balsamic vinegar reduction. I think this will be a salad for special occasions! 10 of 32 Photo by  Ed Grabasandwich 05/12/2019 Love it! Thinly sliced roasted beets on a bed of arugula. Topped with walnuts, crumbled feta and sliced goat cheese, drizzled with a balsamic vinegar reduction. I think this will be a salad for special occasions! 1 2 3 4 Next You’ll Also Love My Favorite Beet Salad 102 Ratings Beet Salad 48 Ratings Arugula Beet Salad 21 Ratings Fresh Beet Salad 51 Ratings Goddess Beet Salad 18 Ratings Russian Beet Salad with Herring 33 Ratings Beet Salad with Goat Cheese 576 Ratings Creamy Beet Salad 16 Ratings Beet, Walnut and Prune Salad 42 Ratings Baby Beet Salad with Walnuts Roasted Beet Salad 7 Ratings SARALEE'S Beet Salad 7 Ratings Easy Roasted Beet Salad with Goat Cheese 2 Ratings Beet Salad with Pecans and Blue Cheese 4 Ratings Beet and Pea Salad 1 Rating German-Style Beet Salad 24 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
